Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, buccal swabs, or saliva samples
Purpose: To perform targeted genetic testing to detect specified familial variants and report the results.
Container: EDTA (lavender-top) tube for blood, buccal swab collection kit, or saliva collection kit
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, gel electrophoresis system, real-time PCR machine, sequencing platform (Sanger or NGS), sequence analysis software
